page.title: 15Kirkby Outdoor Market
page.content: On 3rd May a group of children from Kingsway School went down Lowmoor Road to the open air market.On the market were about 50 stalls.Lots of the stalls sold clothes.Others sold underwear,sportswear,vegetables and meat.We interviewed eight stallholders and four said theirs was a family business.One of the questions asked was,"Roughly how much do you take?"and some of the answers were:"Personal", "Not enough","Noy saying",and"Â£200". The market has operated for about nine years.The rent for one stall is Â£7 per day. Another question was,"Do you sell here each day of opening?"Seven people said "Yes". The market operates from about 8.00 a.m. to 4.00 p.m. on Fridays and Saturdays.
